title: Sony WH-1000XM5 headphones unveiled with new design, improved ANC, and Microsoft Swift Pair
content:
Sony has been nailing headphones for years, starting with the all-around incredible Sony WH-1000XM3 headphones launched in 2018. Sony released their sequel in 2020 in the form of the WH-1000XM4, and now the company has finally unveiled the Sony WH-1000XM5 after a short period of leaks and rumors. They pack a new design, improved ANC,

The post Sony WH-1000XM5 headphones unveiled with new design, improved ANC, and Microsoft Swift Pair appeared first on XDA.
description: Sony's WH-1000XM5 headphones have now been unveiled with a new design, improved ANC, and Microsoft Swift Pair support. Check them out here!
